TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
Hello there, first of all I want to thank you for this mod, I have been using Tantares for a while now and I love it, the perfect add-on for space stations. At first, the mod is intimidating, a lot of parts, all of them very tiny, but after a while it becomes really useful.

I came here to report a bug actually, I'm having a 6 Kraken Attack when using two of the parts in the Tantares mod, one of them is the A-ZX5 Return Parachute and the other one is the A-U2R MonoPropellant Tank, when I use either of them a 6 Kraken Attack occurs at 6k meters, here is a little video explaining the bug, how to replicate it and a little bit of randomness

https://www.youtube.com/embed/n6cx7j7YfkA

This is my complete mod list and I use KSP v1.1.2 btw:

Spoiler

Alternate Resource Panel (AlternateResourcePanel v2.8.1.0)

I think it's a bit useless to report a bug with a GameData full (literally FULL) of mods potentially in conflict with each other... try again on a clean stock version of the game
I might be wrong, but shouldn't Luna probe have an integrated antenna?

2 hours ago, biohazard15 said:

I might be wrong, but shouldn't Luna probe have an integrated antenna?

Yes, when I use it, I add one in manually (to the config file, or in my case with a modulemanager patch).
The only bug I seem to have in 1.1.3 is some of the Tantares docking ports will not disconnect. It happens randomly, though.
I got that in a completely stock install too. I don't think that's Tantares.

T A N T A R E S 36.0

Find any issues? Let me know.
Some probes are removed, the delightful @akron has adopted them.
The TKS solar panel monopropellant tanks finally work correctly, they are quite useful.

  • - ATV Revamp
  • - Removed Luna Probe (CRAFT BREAKING)
  • - Removed Venera Probe (CRAFT BREAKING) 
  • - Fixed TKS Radial Parachute
  • - Fixed TKS solar panel (Now works correctly)
  • - Some small mod support tweaks

BTW, does anybody have KeepFit configs for this lurking around somewhere?

In the first post the show off video. Theres a capsule at 11 seconds.. What's it called? I just want that not all the other parts for Soyuz ect. Is it possible to download individual crafts with out getting a while bunch of parts I don't need?

7 hours ago, Dermeister said:

In the first post the show off video. Theres a capsule at 11 seconds.. What's it called? I just want that not all the other parts for Soyuz ect. Is it possible to download individual crafts with out getting a while bunch of parts I don't need?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuji_(spacecraft) 

In the Tantares folder, each individual spacecraft is bundled under folders. That specific spacecraft is bundled under Fuji. Say you want to keep just the capsule and heat-shield installed, delete everything else in the folder except  _Polaris_CrewA.cfg, and _Polaris_HeatshieldA.cfg and their respective dds files. Also, I don't know if you need the emissive.dds or not, Keep it just to be safe.

Edited July 9, 2016 by Danny88

Thanks

@Beale I seem to have a problem with the fixed (not animate) probe/drogue docking ports (the big ones, can't remember the exact name, but they are those which are meant to be installed on the bigger side of the Soyuz OM). Trouble docking, then when docked camera wobbles like hell until reset of orbit with HyperEdit. At first, remembering an old kraken, I thought this was happening because of part clipping (I have clipped the Q Orbital Systems docking window in the OM). But then, I launched two Progress with no clipped parts and when docked they behaved the same. Then I HyperEdited them (docked in the VAB) and undocked in orbit, same wobbly camera thing until HyperEdit reset of the orbit. I have only parts mod so I shouldn't have any incompatibility

Edited July 10, 2016 by trooperMNG

3 hours ago, Danny88 said:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuji_(spacecraft) 

In the Tantares folder, each individual spacecraft is bundled under folders. That specific spacecraft is bundled under Fuji. Say you want to keep just the capsule and heat-shield installed, delete everything else in the folder except  _Polaris_CrewA.cfg, and _Polaris_HeatshieldA.cfg and their respective dds files. Also, I don't know if you need the emissive.dds or not, Keep it just to be safe.

The emissive.dds is for the window lights, you need it. Generally speaking, unless you REALLY know what you're doing, don't delete anything inside folders other than cfg files. Those will make it so the part doesn't show up in game, but won't break any other parts. You can also delete the .mu files for those parts if you really want to.
